QuestData.Title: Fate of the Queen's Reprisal
QuestData.Description: <This is the kind of intelligence that should be shared. Perhaps someone at the Greyfang Enclave on Dalaran will know what to do with it.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Captain's Log to Lieutenant Surtees at the Greyfang Enclave on Dalaran.
QuestData.RewardText:
<The officer looks down at what you're offering him and his eyes light up.>
Do you know what you have here? You might have just delivered some of the most significant intel of the campaign.
I will see to it personally that this gets into Lord Greymane's hands.
